reviews.customers_say: Customers find the nightgown comfortable with adjustable straps that fit perfectly, and they appreciate its soft, buttery-smooth fabric that stays soft after washing. The nightgown receives positive feedback for its excellent quality, with one customer noting it's not see-through, and they like how it makes them feel cute while wearing it around the house. Customers consider it good value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars COMFORT, QUALITY & PRICE
items.body: Love this so soft feel, & the fit with adjustable straps! The look is high quality pretty, but the price is truly reasonable. So comfy to lounge in. Also provides me with a little sexy, and still acceptable wearing around family, feeling covered! Excellent to sleep in too! Will order 4 more colors! Must have night/sleep wear! Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars CUTE ðŸ‘ COMFY ðŸ‘ ADJUSTABLE STRAPS ðŸ‘ STRETCHY ðŸ‘
items.body: Not going to lie I was skeptical. I have a large bust and most cutesy night gowns are NOT cute. I bought this kinda desperate to feel cute while I sleep. I didnâ€™t think Iâ€™d like it. But I really do. I feel confident too. The quality is great. soft and stretchy. The lace makes it look super cute. I donâ€™t feel uncomfy not wearing a bra with it. The material isnâ€™t thin. But itâ€™s not thick either. Itâ€™s honestly just right especially if you are a warm body. The straps are adjustable so you can figure out how much coverage you want on top. The length is about mid thigh. All together I LOVE this gown. I may buy another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, sweet & feminine nightgown.
items.body: Nightgown fabric is very soft, feels great against the skin. Washed in a delicates mesh bag as concerned the straps are very thin and could tear/break if caught up around other clothing item. Hung to dry, wrinkle free! Runs large, I would size down. Read more
items.author: Teresa M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just As Expected
items.body: Fits true to size with adjustable straps. Super soft material that is perfect for lounging or sleeping in. Color came just as I expected. Overall, very cute and comfy night gown. Read more
items.author: Alyssa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable fabric. Length was perfect.
items.body: Great, soft comfortable fabric. Laundered wonderfully.Great value for money. Read more
items.author: Martha H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OBSESSED! ðŸ˜
items.body: Literally obsessed I love this nightgown! Itâ€™s so cute and soft! Iâ€™m obviously a bigger lady and itâ€™s so complementing to my body type. For reference Iâ€™m big everywhere but my apron belly I hate so this covers it so well. Seems to be really good quality. I love how itâ€™s soft but thin enough to keep cool while sleeping. Definitely worth the price and some. I will be buying all the colors forsure! Read more
items.author: Cristina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE!!!
items.body: I LOVEEEE!! I ordered a black one in a medium size. Itâ€™s so cute, I love the lace detail with the black bow at the top. Itâ€™s comfortable. The perfect length! Great price as well! Read more
items.author: Laura Rowell

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars pretty but should order a size smaller
items.body: its pretty and soft material but it is not true to size, so order a size smaller than you normally wear. Read more
items.author: Brandi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple Dot, Black Floral, Army Green, Black, Black and Flower, Orange Flower, White and Flower, Lake Blue, Cameo Pink, Light Yellow and Flower, Christmas Print, Light Pink, Grey, Lavender Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
